name: Printmaker
description: An artisan who creates prints, posters, and illustrations; adventurers can commission wanted posters, spread propaganda, or uncover secret messages in artwork.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the sharp scent of ink and the sound of presses creating prints. The air carries the promise of mass communication and the essential nature of spreading information, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of artistic expression and the power of visual storytelling.
